mapper.sql: id, promoType, hotelId, hotelName, cityCode, cityName, checkStatus, billTime, beginTime, endTime, orderNum, onlinePaid, aliPaid, wechatPaid, billCost, changeCost, changeCorrectCost, finalCost, income, createTime, financeStatus, availableMoney, isFreeze
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from b_bill_special
order by ${orderByClause} desc
limit ${limitStart} , ${limitEnd}
mapper.insert: insert into b_bill_special (id, promoType, hotelId, hotelName, cityCode, cityName, checkStatus, billTime, beginTime, endTime, orderNum, onlinePaid, aliPaid, wechatPaid, billCost, changeCost, changeCorrectCost, finalCost, income, createTime, financeStatus, availableMoney, isFreeze) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{promotype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hotelid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hotelname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{citycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{billtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ordernum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{onlinepaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{alipaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{wechatpaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{billcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{changecost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{changecorrectcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{finalcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{income,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{financestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{availablemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isfreeze,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update b_bill_special
promoType = #{promotype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hotelId = #{hotelid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
hotelName = #{hotelname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cityCode = #{citycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cityName = #{cityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checkStatus = #{checkstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
billTime = #{billtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
beginTime = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
orderNum = #{ordernum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
onlinePaid = #{onlinepaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
aliPaid = #{alipaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
wechatPaid = #{wechatpaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
billCost = #{billcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
changeCost = #{changecost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
changeCorrectCost = #{changecorrectcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
finalCost = #{finalcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
income = #{income,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
financeStatus = #{financestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
availableMoney = #{availablemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
isFreeze = #{isfreeze,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update b_bill_special set promoType = #{promotype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hotelId = #{hotelid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, hotelName = #{hotelname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cityCode = #{citycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cityName = #{cityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checkStatus = #{checkstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, billTime = #{billtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, beginTime = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, orderNum = #{ordernum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, onlinePaid = #{onlinepaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, aliPaid = #{alipaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, wechatPaid = #{wechatpaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, billCost = #{billcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, changeCost = #{changecost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, changeCorrectCost = #{changecorrectcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, finalCost = #{finalcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, income = #{income,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, financeStatus = #{financestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, availableMoney = #{availablemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, isFreeze = #{isfreeze,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update b_bill_special inner join (select hotelid, max(city.CityName) cityName, max(hotel.hotelname) hotelname, max(hotel.citycode) citycode, min(beginTime) beginTime, min(endTime) endTime, count(1) orderNum, sum(userCost) onlinePaid, sum(case when payMethod = 'Ali_Callback' then 0 else userCost end) wechatPaid, sum(case when payMethod = 'WeChat_Callback' then 0 else userCost end) aliPaid, sum(lezhuCoins) billCost, 0 changeCorrectCost, sum(lezhuCoins) finalCost, sum(userCost)- sum(lezhuCoins) income, sum(availableMoney) availableMoney from b_bill_special_detail detail join t_hotel hotel on detail.hotelid = hotel.id join t_city city on city.code = hotel.citycode where hotelid = #{hotelId} AND orderUpdateTime >= #{beginTime} AND orderUpdateTime < #{endTime} GROUP BY detail.hotelid) detailx on b_bill_special.hotelid = detailx.hotelid set b_bill_special.ordernum = detailx.ordernum, b_bill_special.onlinePaid = detailx.onlinePaid, b_bill_special.aliPaid = detailx.aliPaid, b_bill_special.wechatPaid = detailx.wechatPaid, b_bill_special.billCost = detailx.billCost, b_bill_special.changeCorrectCost = detailx.changeCorrectCost, b_bill_special.finalCost = detailx.finalCost, b_bill_special.income = detailx.income, b_bill_special.availableMoney = detailx.availableMoney, b_bill_special.beginTime = detailx.beginTime, b_bill_special.endTime = detailx.endTime, b_bill_special.hotelname = detailx.hotelname, b_bill_special.citycode = detailx.citycode, b_bill_special.cityName = detailx.cityName, b_bill_special.financestatus = 1, b_bill_special.isFreeze = 'N', b_bill_special.checkstatus = '0', b_bill_special.billtime = #{billTime}, b_bill_special.promotype = '1', b_bill_special.createTime = NOW()
